医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究：口味限制可以在对抗青少年电子烟流行方面取得重大进展俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心烟草研究中心的一项新研究表明，完全限制烟弹和一次性电子烟设备中的甜味剂和清凉剂，可以在对抗青少年电子烟流行方面取得重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Study-Flavor-restrictions-could-make-major-progress-in-fighting-youth-vaping-epidemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Study-Flavor-restrictions-could-make-major-progress-in-fighting-youth-vaping-epidemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=562c6279-6694-496c-b53f-249ca2ff638c Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:17:45 -0400 Study: Flavor restrictions could make major progress in fighting youth vaping epidemic
新研究揭示了孕酮在乳腺癌中的作用2023 年 7 月 1 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“解读孕酮在乳腺癌中的作用机制”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-research-sheds-light-on-role-of-progesterone-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-research-sheds-light-on-role-of-progesterone-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fccc0aaf-9501-4e43-b63f-2e8ba4370268 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 13:52:19 -0400 New research sheds light on role of progesterone in breast cancer
很少有研究强调生活方式干预对产后血压的影响妊娠期高血压疾病（例如先兆子痫和妊娠期高血压）在妊娠中的发生率高达 10%，与健康妊娠相比，慢性高血压的风险增加三倍，心血管疾病的风险增加两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Few-studies-highlight-the-effects-of-lifestyle-interventions-on-postpartum-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Few-studies-highlight-the-effects-of-lifestyle-interventions-on-postpartum-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be83a512-907a-4fd8-8b73-65474748560d Mon, 10 Jul 2023 13:50:26 -0400 Few studies highlight the effects of lifestyle interventions on postpartum blood pressure
参与多项粮食援助计划的低收入家庭消耗更多的 SSB一个长期存在且有争议的问题是美国联邦食品援助计划在多大程度上促进或阻止了健康饮料的摄入。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Low-venue-families-participating-in-multiple-food-assistance-programs-consume-more-SSBs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Low-venue-families-participating-in-multiple-food-assistance-programs-consume-more-SSBs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c55d67d-5cb9-4dcf-85b1-701f5271204d Mon, 10 Jul 2023 13:48:27 -0400 Low-income families participating in multiple food assistance programs consume more SSBs
两种抗炎药可减少重症 COVID-19 患者的死亡人数圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院领导的一项全国研究显示，阿巴西普和英夫利昔单抗这两种抗炎药物减少了重症 COVID-19 住院患者的死亡率。在 COVID-19 大流行期间，领导这项大型临床试验的 William G. Powderly 医学博士（右）与医学博士 Maanasi Samant 在主要试验地点之一巴恩斯犹太医院的重症监护室讨论了患者的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Two-anti-itis-drugs-reduce-deaths-in-severe-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Two-anti-itis-drugs-reduce-deaths-in-severe-COVID-19-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71bd1090-9fa1-441f-a2c8-0d0885b2a2dc Mon, 10 Jul 2023 13:46:14 -0400 Two anti-inflammatory drugs reduce deaths in severe COVID-19 patients
新技术可以帮助识别罕见的遗传疾病，同时保护隐私麦考瑞大学的研究人员展示了一种连接个人记录和保护隐私的新方法。第一个应用是识别罕见遗传疾病的病例。整个社会还有许多其他潜在的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-technique-could-help-identify-rare-genic-disorders-while-preserving-privacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-technique-could-help-identify-rare-genic-disorders-while-preserving-privacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ab7e3a8-68bf-4c27-a85e-5d25bda7656e Mon, 10 Jul 2023 13:44:33 -0400 New technique could help identify rare genetic disorders while preserving privacy
LIONESS：解开大脑之谜的新工具脑组织可以说是科学家处理过的最复杂的标本之一。人类大脑目前蕴藏着无法估量的信息量，是最复杂的计算设备，其网络由约 860 亿个神经元组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/LIONESS-A-new-tool-for-unraveling-mysteries-of-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/LIONESS-A-new-tool-for-unraveling-mysteries-of-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8796a998-d7c3-4479-8708-31fa6901beb2 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 13:14:16 -0400 LIONESS: A new tool for unraveling mysteries of the brain
面对面的正念课程可能有助于预防心理健康问题一项汇集 13 项研究数据的新分析证实，与未参加正念课程的成年人相比，自愿参加正念课程的成年人在完成课程后至少六个月内出现焦虑和抑郁症状的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/In-person-mindativity-courses-may-help-prevent-mental-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/In-person-mindativity-courses-may-help-prevent-mental-health-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59b1b771-511e-4387-a52d-c624cdf54db6 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 13:02:33 -0400 In-person mindfulness courses may help prevent mental health problems
大脑电场驱动神经活动形成记忆大脑的“电路”比喻是无可争议的，因为它是熟悉的：神经元建立直接的物理连接来创建功能网络，例如存储记忆或产生思想。但这个比喻也不完整。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Brains-electric-fields-drive-neural-activity-to-form-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Brains-electric-fields-drive-neural-activity-to-form-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0bfc18e-44b8-434c-8412-8a4d12ab78a6 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 12:53:05 -0400 Brain's electric fields drive neural activity to form memories
对矿物枝晶生长动力学的新见解由维也纳大学、华沙大学物理系和爱丁堡大学的科学家组成的国际研究小组描述了三维锰枝晶的生长过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-insights-into-the-growth-dynamics-of-mineral-dendrites.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/New-insights-into-the-growth-dynamics-of-mineral-dendrites.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4bdfc40-e38a-400d-8478-f9e839e7fe50 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 12:51:24 -0400 New insights into the growth dynamics of mineral dendrites
